message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $140. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a price of $125 for the product.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. Let me make a counteroffer at $135 for the product.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $127 for the product.
I see, Bob. Let's try to find a middle ground. I'll offer the product at $130 for this round.
